Module be.helha.applicine
Package be.helha.applicine.client.views.managerviews

Class SpecialViewableViewController

java.lang.Object
be.helha.applicine.client.views.managerviews.SpecialViewableViewController
public class SpecialViewableViewController extends Object
This class is the controller for the SpecialViewableView window.

    • showSagaForEdit

      public void showSagaForEdit(String name, List<String> addedViewablesTitles, Integer totalDuration)
      Show the editPane to edit a saga. Fill the fields with the saga's information.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the saga
      addedViewablesTitles - the list of movies
      totalDuration - the total duration of the saga

    • prepareForAddSaga

      public void prepareForAddSaga()
      Prepare the view to add a saga. Clear the fields and the list of movies. Reset the style of the buttons.
